alert.note: Alert for Clark; Taylor (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LaCrosse (Southwestern Wisconsin, Southeastern Minnesota, and Northeast Iowa)
info.headline: High Wind Warning issued December 15 at 8:48PM CST until December 16 at 6:00AM CST by NWS LaCrosse
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM CST THURSDAY... ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 9 PM CST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 60 mph. * WHERE...Taylor County. * WHEN...For the High Wind Warning, until 6 AM CST Thursday. For the Dense Fog Advisory, until 9 PM CST this evening. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Widespread power outages are expected. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
